Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Crescent Moon Blade~[;] ~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;] ~Equipment:Polar Star~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~[;]~Equipment:Katana~]; var rewards2 = [~Equipment:Battering Ram~[;] ~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Equipment:Charge!~[;] ~Equipment:Candle~[;]~Equipment:Polar Star~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] ~Upgrade~]); }

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with blah rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Bustle~[;] ~Equipment:Two Handed Spike~[;] ~Equipment:Desperation Attack~[;] ~Equipment:Uberbump~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); }

Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Boosterpack:Hijinx[;]Slapsies[;]Slapsies~[;]~Boosterpack:Fastball[;]Fastball[;]Mirror Cauldron~][;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Subdivide~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor?~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot?~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Subdivide~);
Script: After Level Up: if (levelupselections.indexOf(~Boosterpack:Hijinx[;]Slapsies[;]Slapsies~) > -1){ Rules.substitute(~Flaming Sword~[;] ~Concentration~); Rules.substitute(~Blammo[;]Blammo[;]Blammo~[;] rand([~Hijinx[;]Mercy[;]Concentration~[;] ~Slapsies[;]Lojinx[;]Slapsies~])); } else if (levelupselections.indexOf(~Boosterpack:Flying Skull[;]Evil Laugh[;]Evil Laugh~) > -1){ Rules.substitute(~Flaming Sword~[;] ~Evil Laugh~); Rules.substitute(~Blammo[;]Blammo[;]Blammo~[;] rand([~Evil Laugh[;]Evil Laugh[;]Evil Laugh~[;] ~Manic Laugh[;]Infestation[;]Manic Laugh~])); } else if (levelupselections.indexOf(~Boosterpack:Woof Woof Woof[;]Ruff Ruff Ruff[;]Ruff Ruff Ruff~) > -1){ Rules.substitute(~Flaming Sword~[;] ~Yip Yip Yip~); Rules.substitute(~Blammo[;]Blammo[;]Blammo~[;] rand([~Ruff Ruff Ruff[;]Arf Arf Arf[;]Ruff Ruff Ruff~[;] ~Ruff Ruff Ruff[;]Bow Wow Wow[;]Ruff Ruff Ruff~])); } else if (levelupselections.indexOf(~Boosterpack:Harmony[;]Melody[;]Melody~) > -1){ Rules.substitute(~Flaming Sword~[;] ~Chorus~); Rules.substitute(~Blammo[;]Blammo[;]Blammo~[;] rand([~Melody[;]Harmony[;]Melody~[;] ~Melody[;]Harmony[;]Melody~])); } else if (levelupselections.indexOf(~Boosterpack:Battering Ram[;]Front Line[;]Front Line~) > -1){ Rules.substitute(~Flaming Sword~[;] ~Upkeep~); Rules.substitute(~Blammo[;]Blammo[;]Blammo~[;] rand([~Front Line[;]Fortify[;]Front Line~[;]~Thick Skin[;]Fortify[;]Thick Skin~])); }
